definition: apex/crown of the head/top/roof/most/to carry on the head/to push to the top/to go against/to replace/to substitute/to be subjected to (an aerial bombing, hailstorm etc)/(slang) to "bump" a forum thread to raise its profile/classifier for headwear, hats, veils etc
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc

sentences.english: In the middle of the centerpiece mosaic hangs a chandelier encased in a blue glass cube.
sentences.chinese: 頂面馬賽克圖騰的中心掛着罩着藍色玻璃的枝形吊燈。

sentences.english: The tops of structures assume dumbbell form or "8" shape.
sentences.chinese: 這種結構物的頂面觀呈啞鈴形或“8”字型。

sentences.english: But if it is on the top surface of COTS Corrugating gap, you need to be adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 若是上膠輥瓦楞頂面間隙大，則須加以調整。

sentences.english: G4a) The puzzles must be completely flat on the surface, with either of the two sides on top.
sentences.chinese: 魔板表面必須完全展平，正反任何一面都可以在頂面。

sentences.english: Design and Fabrication of the Tower Column of Nanjing No. 3 Yangtze River Bridge;
sentences.chinese: 南京長江三橋鋼混結合區置於索塔下橫樑頂面。

sentences.english: Let's call that R. And, it lives between the top face and the bottom face.
sentences.chinese: 稱爲R，該圖形在頂面和底面之間。
